name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Idle forest - Plant trees by sharing unused bandwidth

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help reforest the Earth while you browse, turning your everyday internet usage into real trees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your everyday browsing into real-world reforestation! Idleforest converts your shared internet bandwidth into tree plantings, helping combat climate change while you browse normally.

How it works:
- The extension uses Mellowtel's secure bandwidth-sharing technology
- Your shared bandwidth helps power scientific research and legitimate business services
- Every $0.35 earned plants a real tree through verified reforestation partners (https://trees.org/)
- Watch your personal forest grow with our interactive visualization
- Track your COâ‚‚ impact in real-time

Your Privacy & Security:
- Completely anonymous - no personal data collected
- Open-source code for full transparency
- Strict partner vetting through Y Combinator startups
- Secure, monitored, and ethically operated
- No impact on your browsing experience

Join our growing community of passive environmentalists making a real difference. Every tree counts in the fight against climate change - start growing your forest today!

Note: This extension uses Mellowtel's bandwidth-sharing service to generate funds for tree planting. For complete details about how Mellowtel works, visit https://www.mellowtel.com/
